entry.title: Creating Personal Blog Using Github + Hexo
entry.content:
Intro

This is my first blog :)

In this article, I will record my process of creating a personal blog using Github and Hexo. This approach could be used to create any websites, not just blog. I’ll also discuss about some of the problems I met with and the solutions I used during this process, which might be helpful for somebody who visits this website. Hope you enjoy the charm of creation.

Outline

Hexo

What is Hexo?

Hexo is a fast, simple and powerful blog framework; it’s also a static site generator. Click hexo website to get more information.

Installation

We’ll use Hexo to help us create our personal website. Click here to watch the video. Or, just follow the steps below. We need to install a couple of things first.

1. Node.js

Click DownLoad_Nodejs to download Node.js.
Or choose one of the links below.
